Dinner with the Paternos tickets for Penn State President Graham Spaniers tailgate with a suite at Beaver Stadium and a megaphone signed by the Penn State cheerleaders are some of the items available at the Happiest Valley Auction PERIOD

The auction will be at  p.m PERIOD today at the Holiday Inn Express  Waddle Road in State College PERIOD

Sports memorabilia will be auctioned to raise money for Alpha Community Ambulance Service Inc. which serves the Centre region PERIOD

The auction will raise funds to construct a building for the ambulance company PERIOD

The company resides in a building that is not large enough to house its ambulances said Lindsay Terry of The Barash Group PERIOD

The Barash Group ambulance and community members and representatives from Penn State comprise the committee that is in charge of the event PERIOD

Terry said the auction organizers hope to raise  for the ambulance company PERIOD

The total amount of money needed for the new ambulance building is  million PERIOD

The fund now has about . million from other fundraisers and community donations PERIOD

The facility will be built near Porter Road east of College Avenue on land donated by Penn State Terry said PERIOD

The building will have sleeping and training areas for emergency medical technicians and it will also provide the company with muchneeded space she said PERIOD

Other items to be auctioned include footballs signed by sports figures PERIOD

These include Joe Paterno former Pittsburgh Steelers Hall of Famer Franco Harris and Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Donovan McNabb PERIOD

Events at the auction will include appearances by Tatiana Gutsu  Olympic gold medalist in gymnastics and the Penn State womens basketball team PERIOD

More than two guests will be available for pictures PERIOD

Rose Moffett a committee member from The Barash Group and a volunteer with Alpha Ambulance said that community involvement was great and Moffett was also quick to talk about and praise the 

Three silent auctions will begin at  p.m PERIOD

There will also be a live auction that will begin at  p.m PERIOD

Refreshments will be provided PERIOD

Tickets are available through Alpha Ambulance Rider Auto Inc.  W PERIOD College Ave. Wegmans Food Markets Inc.  Lowes Blvd. and Nittany Bank PERIOD
